plot: Pierre Buxeuil is better known as the popular clown Bux. One day, he falls in love with Nicole, a romantic but whimsical young lady. He soon elopes her and the beautiful Nicole follows him,...
title: Le clown Bux

cast.role: Pierre Buxeuil alias le clown Bux
